All Implemented Interfaces:
PetrinetGraph, Iterable<org.graphstream.graph.Node>, org.graphstream.graph.Element, org.graphstream.graph.Graph, org.graphstream.graph.Structure, org.graphstream.stream.AttributeSink, org.graphstream.stream.ElementSink, org.graphstream.stream.Pipe, org.graphstream.stream.Replayable, org.graphstream.stream.Sink, org.graphstream.stream.Source
class GraphStreamPetrinetGraph extends org.graphstream.graph.implementations.MultiGraph implements PetrinetGraph

A GraphStream implementation of PetrinetGraph.

The graph listens to changes in the petrinet passed to it via a PetrinetComponentChangedListener. If the petrinet is not empty it adds all containing components.

  • Method Details

    • toggleNodeMark

      public void toggleNodeMark(PetrinetElement petrinetElement)
      Description copied from interface: PetrinetGraph
      Marks the node representing the element if it is has not been selected and unmark the former marked node (if there was one). If the provided node is already marked unmark it. If null is passed unmark the currently marked node.
      Specified by:
      toggleNodeMark in interface PetrinetGraph
      Parameters:
      petrinetElement - element for which node should be marked / unmarked (null -> currently marked node is unmarked)

    • getElementLabel

      static String getElementLabel(PetrinetElement element)
      Gets the element label -> for transitions "[id] label" is returned, for places "[id] label <numberOfTokens>" is returned.
      Parameters:
      element - the petrinet element for which to return a label
      Returns:
